author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:

This updates the HLT Gen level validation package. It has been running nightly on the PhaseII menu (https://cmshltvalidation.app.cern.ch/display/service-account-cms-tsg-client/CMSSW_14_2_X_2025-02-02-0000.20250203_031557?view=1&selectedPath=HLT_DoubleMediumChargedIsoPFTauHPS40_eta2p1&selectedFilter=hltHpsDoublePFTau40TrackPt1MediumChargedIsolation)  but I just realised I never merge it into the release. Ultimately it would be probably useful to add to the main validation sequence at some point





#### PR validation:

been producing nightly plots at:

https://cmshltvalidation.app.cern.ch/

eg https://cmshltvalidation.app.cern.ch/display/service-account-cms-tsg-client/CMSSW_14_2_X_2025-02-02-0000.20250203_031557?view=1&selectedPath=HLT_DoubleMediumChargedIsoPFTauHPS40_eta2p1&selectedFilter=hltHpsDoublePFTau40TrackPt1MediumChargedIsolation
title: HLT Gen Validation
